reviews.name: Genius USA GX HS G700V CAVIMANUS Headset
reviews.reviewText: These work great, awesome sound quality. You can use them while they're plugged in, which I need. Mic works great. Really comfortable, and block pretty much all background noise.
reviews.title: Great Headset for gamers

reviews.name: Genius USA GX HS G700V CAVIMANUS Headset
reviews.reviewText: This headset works great, the only problems I've had is the volume wheel is on the back and if I lay back in my chair the volume can change. Not a big deal though. The default setting for sound was a little muffled, but since I configured it, it works great now. Mic could be a little longer because I have to change the sensitivity so they can hear me, but then they can hear the game, which would be negated if the mic was longer. They are comfortable to wear, but my ears will sweat from being closed in the ear cups. Overall they are a good headset, had too many problems with wireless ones and I'm sitting in front of my setup so wireless is just a wasted expense and they are wired while charging so whats the difference.
reviews.title: exactly what I needed

reviews.name: Genius USA GX HS G700V CAVIMANUS Headset
reviews.reviewText: I purchased as a gift and they were extremely happy with it.
reviews.title: Great Headset
